# Traxos

> Comprehensive Personal Finance Tracker

Traxos is a modern, high-performance personal finance application designed to help users track expenses, manage debts, and set savings goals with ease. It features real-time synchronization, secure authentication, and an integrated AI assistant for financial insights.

## Core Functionalities

- **Dashboard**: Real-time financial health check (Income vs Expenses).
- **Transactions**: Log, categorize, and filter daily financial activities.
- **Debts & Credits**: Track money owed to you and money you owe to others.
- **Saving Goals**: Visual progress tracking for financial targets.
- **AI Assistant**: Intelligent financial analyst for natural language queries.

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: React, one of the most popular UI libraries.
- **Build Tool**: Vite, ensuring fast development and optimized builds.
- **Platform**: Web (PWA), Local-First Architecture
- **Tech Stack**: React, TypeScript, Vite, TailwindCSS, Supabase (PostgreSQL) for database and real-time features.
- **Hosting**: Vercel for scalable deployment.

## Resources

- **Docs**: [https://traxos.in/info](https://traxos.in/info)
- **Repo**: [https://github.com/waqar741/FinTrac](https://github.com/waqar741/FinTrac)
- **Data Privacy**: [Traxos-Technical-Data-Processing-Guide.pdf](https://traxos.in/docs/Traxos-Technical-Data-Processing-Guide.pdf)

## Ideal For
- Students looking for a secure free expense tracker
- Freelancers managing variable income and client debts
- Couples sharing expenses and tracking household budgets
- Small business owners needing simple cash flow management
- Travelers wanting an offline capable finance app
- Roommates splitting bills and tracking shared debts
- Gig economy workers tracking daily earnings and expenses
- Digital nomads needing a multi-currency ready tracker
- Privacy-conscious users wanting a secure financial assistant
- Anyone replacing manual spreadsheets with a modern app
- Users looking for a free alternative to Splitwise
- People paying off loans who need a debt payoff tracker
- Savers visualizing multiple financial goals
- Budgeting beginners needing simple insights
- Offline-first users in low connectivity areas
- Developers analyzing open source fintech code
- Families planning monthly household expenditures
- Event planners tracking specific project budgets
- Contractors issuing credits and tracking payments
- Minimalists wanting a clean, ad-free finance interface
